about.me: Hi, I'm Eztero, I'm from Chile. I am a committed and experienced operator, I started managing the pool from the beginning of the ITN (Incentived Testnet Network). The name of my pool Tricahue refers to a species of parrot endemic to my country that is in danger of extinction
about.server: My server located in Chile is a Honeycomb LX2 with ARM architecture (low power). It has 64GB of ECC RAM and 4TB of SSD storage in RAID 0 to improve latency. The RAID card has cachevault enabled, a system to prevent data loss during power outages. The server also has a UPS to ensure its operation in the event of power outages or surges and 240 Mbps dedicated up/down managed by a firewall.
